resources.string: Make your system transitions more awesome or horrible
Change things of your HW buttons
Set some gestures to make stuff easier
Change layout and features on your LS
Some random stuff that doesn\'t go in other options
Teach your navbar some newer tricks
Make that shutdown menu more useful
The statusbar is nice but it could be better
Get those volume buttons to do magic stuff
Change how you can see those notifications
Some info about us, just in case you\'re curious about it
Some more info about our project
Bootleggers is a ROM packed with features and apps with the purpose of make your feel like 家. Hope you like it and enjoy our experience.
Touch here to see who made and inspired this project. Also, huge thanks to %s for bring it for %s.
Touch here to see who made and inspired this project.
Check the current list of features on this build
Recommended list of Themes and Mods from our part (a.k.a honest advertisement)
Make people know about us and our work! We\'ll really appreciate it.

It seems that you\'re running a Mad Stinky build, that means that you\'re using a totally experimental build, and obviously bugs and issues are expected. If the bugs you\'re facing aren\'t listed on our post about this kind of builds, please report it to our Telegram group or, in case that\'s a device-related issue, report it who did the build.
See the latest changes added on this build
Welcome to Bootleggers! We hope you have a great time with our features and additions. Our goal is making you feel like 家.
From clock position, QS header images and styles, to even themes and default apps. All you might need is ready to you to mix it up and make your device the coolest phone in the west.
Shishu Themes that make you dream
From a great selection of styles and inspired by various UI designs over the years, Shishu themes are ready to make the UI a bit refreshing. You should give them a shot.
Hope you have a great time setting up your %s and enjoy the ROM! Don\'t forget to join our Telegram chat and let us know what do you think! %s
Enjoy this shishufied release, remember to send logs when things get broken and keep the bootleg!
Remember this is a unofficial build, so, we can\'t provide a lot of support on our chat. Anything than else, have fun!
Oh, this is not nice, this build is a weird one. So, we can\'t give you any support. So, anyways... have fun with this ROM.
Where we will post about releases and news
Where our sources and reverts are placed
Talk with us, get hyped with future updates and join our great community

I think you found this really not so secret place but well, if you got here i just want to let you know that thank you for flashing this ROM and welp, as we said many times before, hope you enjoy it and have a good time with this ROM.
We don\'t speak your language? So come here and feel free to help us to translate our ROM to your native language!
So come here and feel free to help us to translate our ROM to your native language!
Where all the most asked questions and requested features got their answer.
Donate to support this project, we\'ll appreciate it a lot
Hey, i\'m using this ROM called Bootleggers, it\'s nice tbh. You should check more about it on https://bootleggersrom.github.io
I\'ve installed Bootleggers ROM and it seems to be good at the moment, you should check more on https://bootleggersrom.github.io
So i went to Bootleggers ROM and i\'m liking the experience for now, it\'s a pretty cool ROM
Hey, i\'ve just flashed Bootleggers and i\'m kinda enjoying the ROM right now, i would recommend it
I went to Bootleggers ROM, it seems pretty nice, it got some different default fonts and various features
Um, i\'m testing bootleggers and it\'s a bit weird but not a bad ROM
Check if there\'s any new release
Some (or maybe all) of this animations may not work if your device got a transparent theme!
Press on color below to apply
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevent burn-in by shifting pixels every

Smart Pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see a significant improvement in battery life. For a good user experience, we recommend setting the amount of disabled pixels to 75 percent while shifting every 10 minutes.
Disable to block notifications sound and vibration when the screen is awake
Show the music track title as the QS tile title
Force apps to ignore notch space
Show on QS when an app is using the Microphone or Location
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pulse ambient display on new song
When a new song is playing, wake up the screen to display the new info
Shows some spectrum bars reacting to the music you\'re listening (works with most audio apps)
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Control the blur amount of media artwork
Show LS Visualizer on Ambient Display
Shows the visualization bars also on ambient display (but less opaque)
Select what to show when you press the power button
When restarting also show options for recovery and bootloader
Enable power menu on lock screen
This will only enable the power menu on secure lock screens
This feature requires a SystemUI restart to be applied. We\'ll restart the SystemUI right now.
Unlock with fingerprint even after a reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: Use at your own risk!
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
See if your network is doing something with this useful icon
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Disable the tile running services icon in the footer
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double-tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness icon to the right of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
For better visibility on bright images
Click on any image to use for static mode
Select an image to use for static mode
Toggle to enable setting max notifications count on lockscreen
Control the maximum number of expanded notifications to show on lockscreen
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
Show current weather condition and temperature
Instead of using the big widget, it\'ll show next to the date
Show name of current city on left of image
Show current city temperature on right of image
Toogle to show custom text on qs footer
Ideal to promote something, if empty, it\'ll show the default text
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running in the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
On signal icon, show 4G instead of LTE
Show the small signal icon style used since android KitKat
Show charging current, voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Display VoLTE icon (Needs a SystemUI restart to take effect)
Tweak the clock according to your tastes
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display the cross next to statusbar when data is disabled
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Blurs the darkened background behind quick settings
Set radius of blur behind QS panel
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Show heads up only for dialer, messaging and alarm app
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup messages except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Display and customize battery bar near status bar or navigation bar
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Launch music app on headset connection
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
When an app is trying to access the clipboard, show an informative toast about it
Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Display the number of pending notifications
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Add our custom logo on your statusbar to brag about what ROM are you on
Prevent apps from appearing in recents
Show buttons to increase or decrease the brightness
Show condition cards on the dashboard
Show suggestion cards on the dashboard
